Author: Critical_Strawberry
Text: I am the same. Nut used to be my trigger food. I had to cut it out for a month or two. I lost the taste for it now I have had a huge jar in the cupboard for around two weeks with no urge to to binge on it. Maybe try cutting it out for a bit and reintroduce it when you feel ready. That’s helped me

Author: scaredyk4t
Text: Pbfit!!! I binge so hard on peanut butter but with pbfit at least it’s way less cals
